snippet: American and South Korean troops increased alert levels on Wednesday as South Korea’s foreign minister warned that the North could launch its medium-range Musudan missile “any time from now.”
abstract: American and South Korean troops increase alert levels as South Korea’s foreign minister warns that North could launch its medium-range Musudan missile at any time.

byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: American and South Korean troops increased alert levels on Wednesday as South Korea’s foreign minister warned that the North could launch its medium-range Musudan missile “any time from now.”

headline.seo: U.S. and South Korea Gird for North Missile Test
headline.main: U.S. and South Korea Put Forces on Alert for Missile Test by North
headline.print_headline: U.S. and South Korea Put Forces on Alert for Missile Test by North
